name: Room231
description:
Room231

Backroom: Room231 is a "hardcore" single player horror game, which is based on the famous creepy pasta called "Backrooms". In this game, you will need to find an exit of level231 while hiding from dangerous environments and entities. However, you will need to find every "objects" from other levels of backrooms to open the exit of level231.

Uncanny Rooms

Currently, Room231 has 8 levels. Level231 is a main level, which is the beginning and end map for the player's escape. It is a familiar place, but becareful. Uncanny experiences are waiting for you. There are 6 more levels that have "objects" which must placed in the right location in level231. While collecting these objects, player will be able to reach the truth of level231 and exit to live. Each levels contain various of puzzles and mechanics which requires both physically and mentally. You better watch out. These puzzles are quite hard.
These are current levels:
1- Level 231
2- Level 6
3- Level 7
4- Level 19
5- Level 34
6- Level 69
7- Level Maze(Original level)
8- Level Forest(Original level)

Entities

During your uncanny adventure, you will meet several entities. Some of them are based on the original backrooms, others are this game's original entities. Each entities have different patterns and gimmicks, so you would better to know that and find best way to esacpe from those.

Puzzles&Items

You will need to solve lots of puzzles during your journey for reach to every exits of backrooms. Each puzzles have unique and interesting gimmicks which requires you to think creatively. And to solve puzzles, to live, to hide from entities, you can use lots of items and tools. You can save them in their inventory, or hold them with hand.

Future Updates

Since I am a solo developer, it is hard to guarantee fast updates and reponses, but I will keep update
Room231 and communicate with you guys for best creepy experience.

If you encounter any issues&bugs feel free to send me: dudwlstldud@gmail.com
